document_data.caption: A map of Nandar's Ride.
document_data.name: Nandar's Ride
document_data.refs: {{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2014)/Waterdeep alleys}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Nandar's Ride''' was an alley in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This alley began at the back entrance of the [[Nandar villa]] and stretched northward until terminating at [[Delzorin Street]].
